title: rustc doesn't seem to acknowledge llvm-args's dwarf-version flag
body:
I'm trying to get DWARF version 3 in my binary with `rustc main.rs -o ./out -g -Cllvm-args="--dwarf-version=3"` but it doesn't seem to work:

```shell
$ readelf --debug-dump=info ./out | grep -A 2 'Compilation Unit @' | grep Version
   Version:       5
   Version:       5
   Version:       5
   Version:       5
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       4
   Version:       5
```

For context: the reason I want to do this is because I want to use the [Coz profiler](https://github.com/plasma-umass/coz) with Rust and it seemingly doesn't like DWARF version 5 which Rust generates (its dying words are: `unknown compilation unit version 5`), so I want to compile with version 3 because that's what [the Coz README specifies](https://github.com/plasma-umass/coz#:~:text=with%20debug%20information%20(-,%2Dg%20%2Dgdwarf%2D3,-).%20You%20do%20not). See also Coz issues [#193](https://github.com/plasma-umass/coz/issues/193), [#107](https://github.com/plasma-umass/coz/issues/107).

A few notes:
- I also tried adding `-C link-arg=-gdwarf-3` as mentioned in the first [comment](https://github.com/plasma-umass/coz/issues/193#issuecomment-1016513806) to the first issue above which didn't help.
- I got the idea to try the `dwarf-version` flag from `rustc -Cllvm-args="--help"`.
- I'm not sure if this is a case of user error since I'm oblivious to the inner working of rustc and I apologize in advance. I'm also not sure if what I'm trying to do is deliberately impossible and if so I might consider this an issue in the `rustc` help message informing of the option, rather than the code-generation.
- Minimal example [here](https://github.com/yehuthi/rustc_dwarf_version).

I'm on x86_64 Arch Linux and rustc 1.65.0-nightly (1d37ed661 2022-09-09).
